abstract: Cisco on Monday raised its bid for Norwegian video conferencing equipment maker Tandberg by about 11 percent, gaining the acceptance of the target’s two largest shareholders with the new offer.
snippet: Cisco on Monday raised its bid for Norwegian video conferencing equipment maker Tandberg by about 11 percent, gaining the acceptance of the target’s two largest shareholders with the new offer.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems on Monday raised its bid for the Norwegian video conferencing equipment maker Tandberg by about 11 percent, gaining the acceptance of the target’s two largest shareholders with the new offer.
